alert.note: Alert for Benzie; Grand Traverse; Leelanau (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:28PM EDT until August 03 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Leelanau County in northern Michigan... Northeastern Benzie County in northern Michigan... Southwestern Grand Traverse County in northern Michigan... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 528 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Ann, or 9 miles east of Empire, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Traverse City, Kingsley, Lake Ann, Maple City, Grawn, Interlochen, Hannah, Interlochen State Park and Bendon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
